name: Shade + Light Refillable Powder Face Contour Palette
about: What it is:A refillable matte face contour palette with three shades for contouring and three shades for highlighting..Highlighted Ingredients:- Wild Rose Extract, Safflower Seed Oil, and Vitamin E: Condition skin for a flawless finish..Ingredient Callouts:Free of parabens and phthalates. It is also cruelty-free..What Else You Need to Know:KVD Beautyâ€™s iconic contour palette lets you quickly chisel and shape your features for enhanced definition, no matter your skill level. The highly pigmented, silky, blendable powders blend effortlessly to flatter every face shape. It has removable magnetic pans to refill and customize your ideal palette..This Palette Contains:
ingredients: Wild Rose Extract, Safflower Seed Oil, and Vitamin E: Help condition skin for a flawless finish...Levitation/Lyric/Lucid:Mica, Zinc Stearate, Dimethicone, Ethylhexyl Palmitate, Silica, Squalane, Polyethylene, Lauroyl Lysine, Glyceryl Caprylate, Sodium Dehydroacetate, Potassium Sorbate, Tocopheryl Acetate, Carthamus Tinctorius (Safflower) Seed Oil, Rosa Canina Flower Extract. May Contain: Titanium Dioxide (Ci 77891), Yellow 5 Lake (Ci 19140), Iron Oxides (Ci 77491, Ci 77492, Ci 77499)...Shadowplay:Mica, Zinc Stearate, Silica, Polyethylene, Dimethicone, Ethylhexyl Palmitate, Squalane, Glyceryl Caprylate, Sodium Dehydroacetate, Lauroyl Lysine, Potassium Sorbate, Tocopheryl Acetate, Carthamus Tinctorius (Safflower) Seed Oil, Rosa Canina Flower Extract, Titanium Dioxide (Ci 77891), Iron Oxides (Ci 77491, Ci 77492, Ci 77499)...Subconscious:Mica, Zinc Stearate, Silica, Polyethylene, Dimethicone, Squalane, Ethylhexyl Palmitate, Glyceryl Caprylate, Lauroyl Lysine, Sodium Dehydroacetate, Tocopheryl Acetate, Potassium Sorbate, Carthamus Tinctorius (Safflower) Seed Oil, Rosa Canina Flower Extract,.Titanium Dioxide (Ci 77891), Iron Oxides (Ci 77491, Ci 77492, Ci 77499)...Sombre:Mica, Zinc Stearate, Silica, Squalane, Polyethylene, Ethylhexyl Palmitate, Dimethicone, Glyceryl Caprylate, Lauroyl Lysine, Sodium Dehydroacetate, Potassium Sorbate, Tocopheryl Acetate, Carthamus Tinctorius (Safflower) Seed Oil, Rosa Canina Flower Extract, Water, Sodium Sulfate, Titanium Dioxide (Ci 77891), Iron Oxides (Ci 77491, Ci 77492, Ci 77499), Ultramarines (Ci 77007), Manganese Violet (Ci 77742).
how_to_use: Suggested Usage:.-Apply with your favorite cruelty-free contour and highlight brushes for a smooth, seamless blend...Refill Product Instructions:.-To swap out shades or refill, insert a pin into the hole on the back of the palette.
